content:

whitequark commented on Issue #1784:

  • New mutator that tries to move instructions to the entry block (closes #1540)

Thank you for adding this!

teapotd commented on Issue #1784:

Can you keep this one. I think it can help prevent duplication in some cases.

Sure. I added also check if function still crashes after resolving them, just to be sure.

teapotd edited a comment on Issue #1784:

Can you keep this one. I think it can help prevent duplication in some cases.

Sure. I added also check if function still crashes after resolving the aliases, just to be sure.

(edit: this is reply to a comment that got lost in old commit version)
